section.name: Workflow
section.p:
Workflow is a topic that both CollabNet and the community recognize as a valuable
aspect of any defect tracking system. Brian Behlendorf has written a response to
questions about plans for workflow in Scarab.

Brian's response
is available in the Scarab users mail list.
A user has volunteered to contribute their workflow efforts! This will be a basic implementation, but may help get us closer.
